Notebook Magics
===============

Magics provide enhanced functionalities and shortcuts when working with notebooks in JupyterLab.

Implemented Magics
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   arg

Add New Magics
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

The magic system of Dockerfile Kernel is extendable.
See :doc:`here <create_new_magic>` on how to do it.
